response: "{ \"title\": \"Easy Python Coding Question: Even Number Checker\", \"description\": \"Write a function `is_even` that checks if a given number is even.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef is_even(num: int) -> bool:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `num` (int): An integer to be checked.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns `True` if the input number is even, `False` otherwise.\\n\", \"code\": \"def is_even(num: int) -> bool:\\n    return num % 2 == 0\", \"tests\": [\"assert is_even(4) == True\", \"assert is_even(7) == False\", \"assert is_even(-5) == False\", \"assert is_even(0) == True\"] }"
